Frequently Asked Questions

How much does ductless mini-split installation cost?

Ductless Mini-Split Installation starts at $2800. Price varies by number of zones and capacity. We provide upfront pricing before any work begins.

How long does ductless mini-split installation take?

1 day for single zone installation. We work efficiently to minimize disruption while ensuring quality workmanship.

Do you offer a warranty on ductless mini-split installation?

Yes, we provide 10-year warranty on equipment, 2-year on installation. All work is backed by our satisfaction guarantee.
